effect.shortEffect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.
effect.full: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

description.black-white: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
description.black-2-white-2: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
description.x-y: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
description.sun-moon: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
description.sword-shield: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
